Unofficial Browser extension for Hubspot users. 
Automatically clicks "save" buttons and lets you work faster. 

🚄 Save time updating data
🛟 Avoid losing data on accidental navigation
🔒 We NEVER save any of your Hubspot data on our servers

Features
🚀 Set a delay for saving data updates
⏱️ Set a delay for saving while you type in text boxes

Please leave a review if you like it! 🙏

Data Privacy🔒
The Autosave extension never stores any of your Hubspot data on our servers. When installing the extension, your browser notifies you that the extension can "read and change your data on all hubspot.com sites", and  "read your browser history".

The reasons are:
- we need to be able to read the Hubspot website to detect the save button and notes ("read data")
- we need to be able to click the save button when it appears ("change data")
- we need to be able to detect if you're on hubspot.com to trigger the save button search ("read browser history")

More features and feedback 🔄
📈 Submit your feature suggestions or feedback via email to autosaveextension@gmail.com!

Notes: We're not affiliated with Hubspot, Inc.
